examples: Tell me a recipe for Biryani

responses.ingredients: 2 cups basmati rice, 1 lb chicken, 2 onions, 2 tomatoes, 1 tbsp ginger garlic paste, 2 tbsp yogurt, 1 tsp garam masala, 1 tsp turmeric, 1 tbsp coriander powder, 1 tbsp cumin, 1 cinnamon stick, 3 cloves, 2 bay leaves, 4 cups water, Salt to taste, Fresh cilantro for garnish
responses.instructions: 1. Wash and soak rice for 30 minutes. 2. Heat oil in a pot and fry onions until golden brown. 3. Add ginger-garlic paste and chicken, and cook until browned. 4. Add tomatoes, yogurt, and spices, and cook for 10 minutes. 5. Add rice, water, and salt, bring to a boil. 6. Cover and cook on low heat for 15 minutes. 7. Garnish with cilantro and serve.

examples: Give me a Chicken Karahi recipe

responses.ingredients: 1 lb chicken, 2 tbsp ginger garlic paste, 2 onions, 2 tomatoes, 3-4 green chilies, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp coriander, 1 tsp garam masala, 1 tsp chili powder, 1/2 cup yogurt, 2 tbsp oil, Fresh cilantro for garnish
responses.instructions: 1. Heat oil in a karahi. 2. Fry onions. 3. Add chicken. 4. Add tomatoes & spices. 5. Cook 15 minutes. 6. Garnish with cilantro.

examples: Give me a recipe for Gajar ka Halwa
How to make Gajar ka Halwa?

responses.ingredients: 4 large carrots, 4 cups milk, 1 cup sugar, 1/2 cup ghee, 1/4 tsp cardamom powder, almonds, cashews, raisins
responses.instructions: 1. Cook grated carrots in milk. 2. Reduce milk. 3. Add sugar & ghee. 4. Add cardamom. 5. Add nuts.

examples: Tell me a recipe for Nihari

responses.ingredients: 2 lbs beef, onions, ginger garlic, tomatoes, cumin, coriander, garam masala, chili powder
responses.instructions: 1. Fry onions. 2. Add beef. 3. Add tomatoes & spices. 4. Add water & cook 2‚Äì3 hrs.

examples: Give me a recipe for Haleem

responses.ingredients: 1 cup wheat, 1 cup barley, 1 lb chicken, onions, spices
responses.instructions: 1. Soak grains. 2. Cook meat. 3. Blend grains. 4. Mix & cook.

examples: Give me a recipe for Kebabs

responses.ingredients: 500g minced beef, 2 onions, 1 tbsp ginger garlic paste, 2 tbsp yogurt, 1 tsp garam masala, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp coriander powder, 1/2 tsp chili powder, Salt to taste, Fresh coriander for garnish
responses.instructions: 1. Mix all ingredients and form into small kebabs. 2. Grill or fry on medium heat for 10‚Äì15 minutes. 3. Garnish with coriander and serve.

examples: Give me a recipe for Palak

responses.ingredients: 500g spinach, 1 onion, 2 tomatoes, 1 tbsp ginger garlic paste, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp garam masala, Salt to taste, 2 tbsp oil
responses.instructions: 1. Cook spinach until wilted. 2. Heat oil in a pan and saut√© onions and spices. 3. Add tomatoes and cook for 10 minutes. 4. Add spinach and cook for 5 more minutes.

examples: Give me a recipe for Rice Pudding

responses.ingredients: 1 cup rice, 4 cups milk, 1/2 cup sugar, 1 tsp cardamom powder, 1/4 cup raisins, 1/4 cup almonds
responses.instructions: 1. Boil rice in milk until tender. 2. Add sugar and cook for 10 more minutes. 3. Garnish with raisins, almonds, and cardamom powder.

examples: Give me a recipe for Dal Tadka

responses.ingredients: 1 cup yellow lentils, 1 onion, 2 tomatoes, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp coriander, 1 tsp garam masala, 2 green chilies, 2 tbsp ghee, Salt to taste
responses.instructions: 1. Boil lentils in water until soft. 2. In a pan, heat ghee and saut√© onions, tomatoes, and spices. 3. Add boiled lentils and cook for 10 minutes.

examples: Give me a recipe for Tandoori Chicken

responses.ingredients: 1 whole chicken, 1 cup yogurt, 1 tbsp ginger garlic paste, 1 tbsp tandoori masala, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp coriander, Salt to taste
responses.instructions: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for 2 hours. 2. Preheat the oven to 180¬∞C. 3. Roast the chicken for 45 minutes.

examples: Give me a recipe for a Burger

responses.ingredients: 1 lb ground beef, 4 burger buns, 1 onion, lettuce, tomato, ketchup, mustard
responses.instructions: 1. Form beef into patties and grill. 2. Toast burger buns. 3. Assemble with lettuce, tomato, and condiments.

examples: Give me a recipe for Pizza

responses.ingredients: 1 pizza dough, 1 cup tomato sauce, 1 cup mozzarella cheese, pepperoni slices, bell peppers, onions
responses.instructions: 1. Preheat the oven to 200¬∞C. 2. Roll out dough and add sauce. 3. Top with cheese and toppings. 4. Bake for 12‚Äì15 minutes.

examples: Give me a recipe for Chocolate Cake

responses.ingredients: 1 1/2 cups flour, 1 cup sugar, 1/2 cup cocoa powder, 1 tsp baking powder, 1/2 cup butter, 2 eggs, 1 cup milk, 1 tsp vanilla extract
responses.instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 180¬∞C. 2. Mix dry ingredients, then add wet ingredients. 3. Bake for 30 minutes.

examples: Give me a recipe for Pasta

responses.ingredients: 1 cup pasta, 2 cups tomato sauce, 1/2 cup parmesan cheese, 1 tbsp olive oil, garlic
responses.instructions: 1. Boil pasta. 2. Heat oil and saut√© garlic. 3. Add tomato sauce and cook for 10 minutes. 4. Toss pasta with sauce and cheese.

examples: Give me a recipe for Fried Rice

responses.ingredients: 2 cups rice, 1/2 cup peas, 1/2 cup carrots, 2 eggs, soy sauce, green onions, oil
responses.instructions: 1. Cook rice. 2. Saut√© veggies and scrambled eggs. 3. Add rice, soy sauce, and cook for 5 minutes.

examples: Give me recipe for Strawberry Shake

responses.ingredients: 1 cup strawberries, 1 cup milk, 2 tbsp sugar, 2 scoops vanilla ice cream
responses.instructions: 1. Add strawberries, milk, and sugar to a blender. 2. Blend until smooth. 3. Add ice cream and blend again for 5 seconds. 4. Serve chilled.

examples: Give me recipe for Mango Shake

responses.ingredients: 1 cup mango chunks, 1 cup chilled milk, 2 tbsp sugar, ice cubes
responses.instructions: 1. Add mango, milk, and sugar to a blender. 2. Blend until thick and smooth. 3. Add ice cubes and blend for a few seconds.

responses.ingredients: 2 tbsp cocoa powder, 2 scoops chocolate ice cream, 1 cup milk, 1 tbsp sugar
responses.instructions: 1. Add cocoa, ice cream, milk, and sugar to blender. 2. Blend until smooth. 3. Serve with chocolate syrup.

responses.ingredients: 4 Oreo cookies, 1 cup milk, 2 scoops vanilla ice cream
responses.instructions: 1. Crush Oreos and add to blender. 2. Add milk and ice cream. 3. Blend for 10 seconds. 4. Serve chilled.

responses.ingredients: 1 cup milk, 2 tbsp rooh afza, falooda sev, 1 scoop ice cream, basil seeds
responses.instructions: 1. Soak basil seeds. 2. Boil falooda sev. 3. Add rooh afza to milk. 4. Layer basil seeds, sev, milk, and ice cream in a glass.

responses.ingredients: 1/2 cup rice, 4 cups milk, 1/2 cup sugar, cardamom powder, almonds
responses.instructions: 1. Boil rice in milk until soft and thick. 2. Add sugar and cardamom. 3. Garnish with almonds.

responses.ingredients: 2 bananas, 1 cup milk, 2 tbsp sugar, 1 tbsp custard powder
responses.instructions: 1. Boil milk. 2. Mix custard in water and add to milk. 3. Add sugar. 4. Add sliced bananas and chill.

examples: How to make Strawberry Ice Cream?
Give me recipe for strawberry icecream

responses.ingredients: 1 cup cream, 1/2 cup milk, 1/2 cup sugar, 1 cup chopped strawberries
responses.instructions: 1. Blend strawberries with sugar. 2. Add cream and milk and mix well. 3. Freeze for 6 hours, mixing every hour.
